data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during El Gallego cruise from La Coruña to La Habana started at 1768-01-03
Ship: El Gallego (Paquebote), Voyage: La Coruña - La Habana, 1st Observer: Capitan
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
